Foolproof solution:

1. Create fuselage

2. Add one (single) wing

3. Add winglet to wingtip

4. Select original wing (part)

5. Replace using 2-way symmetry in mirror mode.

"""It seems the game forces radial symmetry mode for the children from the cloned part in this scenario, even if they were placed with mirror symmetry initially""'
